front.title: PIV card application and middleware interface test guidelines (SP800-73-2 compliance)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: The objective of this document [SP 800-85A-1] is to provide test requirements and test assertions that could be used to validate the compliance/conformance of two PIV components PIV middleware and PIV card application with the specifications in NIST SP 800-73-2.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
